basic_info.description: In 2022 I became a software developer. I/'ve always had a technical background. At 21, I joined the Navy and worked on submarines. Eventually I became the Nuclear Electrician Chief for the sub. Had some of the greatest experiences that were filled with dynamic problem solving centering around team mission and goals. In 2017 I separated from the Navy and worked for King County until deciding I needed a new challenge. So I became a Full-Stack JavaScript Developer. I/'ve enjoyed the similarities of complexness centering around the team environment so far and am excited for opportunities to learn and grow in this field.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Mood Support
projects.description: Group Project to give suggest songs and movies with supporting quote and references based on form data input. I was responsible for writing JavaScript that would return pre determined songs/movies/quotes/references. I designed the data to fit what the front end half of the team was designing for. Very fun project for dynamic teamwork and defined roles.

projects.title: CF Work
projects.description: Individual projects of Odd Products and Salmon Cookies. Odd Products,
